title: El Shaddai Gaiden: Exodus
original_name: El Shaddai 外伝 エクソダス
sinopse: A side story to the 2011 video game El Shaddai. Enoch, freshly summoned from Earth by God to serve as a clerk in Heaven, is thrust into the world of Heaven, where not everything is what it seems. A conspiracy is brewing in Heaven, and the only one on his side is an angel by the name of Lucifel...
